message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you the opportunity to purchase this valuable product. I think you'll really appreciate its features and benefits. I'm willing to offer it to you for $18000.
I appreciate your offer, Alice, but I'm looking to save as much as I can. I'm willing to pay $12000 for the product. Can you consider my offer?

I understand you're looking to save some money, Bob, but I've got to make a profit on this sale. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I need to make at least $16000 to feel good about the deal. How about we meet at $14000?
I understand your concerns, Alice, but I'm still looking to save some money. I'm willing to meet you halfway on your latest offer. How about we meet at $13000?
I appreciate your persistence, Bob, but I'm still not comfortable going that low. I'm willing to make one more concession, but I need to get closer to my minimum price. How about we meet at $16500?
I understand you're trying to get closer to your minimum price, Alice, but I'm still looking to save some money. I'm willing to compromise further. How about we meet at $13500?
